alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 22 at 1:42AM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417 AND 418... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WIND...West to southwest 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 8 to 13 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new or active fires will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland
